lead_paragraph: The Sports of The Times column on Thursday, about the years of frustration for fans of Major League Soccer’s New York area franchise before the Red Bulls’ current playoff run, misstated the nickname of the Chicago team, which captured the 2003 United States Open Cup by defeating the New York squad (then the MetroStars). It is the Fire, not the Sting. The column also misstated part of the Internet address for a Red Bulls fan Web site. It is www.ragingbullnation.net.
